level.heading: DEBTS AND REPAYMENT AGREEMENTS POLICIES (ยง 14-5600)

level.text: 5600.1 DCHA shall make a concerted effort to collect the debt when it is determined that participant families or owners owe money to DCHA.
DCHA shall use a variety of collection tools to recover debts including, but not limited to:
Reductions in payments for other units;
